description:
Season: 31
Original Air Date: 11/08/2017

Bill finds himself in a very uncomfortable position when he becomes the target of threats and vilifications by the Spectra group.  Brooke has a difficult time trying to interpret Bill’s actions when Katie tells her about the Spectra building’s demolition.  Bill enters Liam and Sally’s hospital room with his tail between his legs and his heart filled with guilt begging for forgiveness.  His attempt proves to be unsuccessful as Liam refuses all offers to even discuss a reconciliation.  While maintaining a neutral stance, Steffy tries to help Liam better understand Bill’s side of the mishap.  Bill returns home to find Brooke waiting to discuss their future together.  Liam feels guilty about his kiss with Sally, while Sally reminisces about it fondly.
